title: Income Platform — Investment Thesis
md: BlueNord operates a producing asset base designed to generate consistent cash flow and distribute 50–70% of net operating cash flow to shareholders on a quarterly basis.

title: Production & Asset Base
md: Production profile, reserve life, and cost structure form the foundation of the income platform.

title: Cash Flow Engine
md: Revenue – Operating Costs = Net Operating Cash Flow → 50–70% distributed quarterly.

title: Dividend Framework
md: Formal board commitment to distribute 50–70% of net operating cash flow.

title: Hedging & Protection
md: Structured hedging and disciplined balance sheet management provide downside protection.

title: Sensitivity & Resilience
md: Dividend and coverage sensitivity to oil and gas price scenarios.
